property.value: insert into Annotation (annotatedObjId, annotatedObjType, jobId, dateTime, authority_id, type, code, recordType) select distinct o.id, :annotatedObjType, :jobId, now(), :authorityId, 'Warn', 'Absent', :annotatedObjType from Image o join Taxon_Image o_t on (o.id = o_t.images_id) join Taxon t on (o_t.Taxon_id = t.id) left join Taxon a on (t.acceptedNameUsage_id = a.id) where o.authority_id = :authorityId and (t.#subsetRank = :subsetValue or a.#subsetRank = :subsetValue)
